Upper Canada College

Events Articles Clubs

British Biology Competition

An annual opportunity for students to test their skills in Biology, UCC is hosting its first BBO competition this year virtually.

Wizprodigy Robotics

The Wizprodigy comeptition allows students to design their own robotics trucks and compete in competitions, with prizes and scholarships worth up to $2000.


Get Involved in STEM at UCC

Upper Canada College offers many exciting and innovative STEM activities. Built by the STEM committee, this website provides a central hub of information, thoughts, and resources for everything related to STEM at the college. Check out the STEM activities students are engaged in!
